posts.title: Mortal Kombat 1
posts.body:
There are new things, new information about this new game, Mortal Kombat 1(2023 version), that Ed Boon and Netherrealm Studios just published recently.
This game takes place after the event of Mortal Kombat 11 Aftermath.
In that game, Fire God Kang Liu defeated Shang Tsung in a one-on-one match, resulting in Kang Liu defeating Shang Tsung, crafted the new timeline, and Kang Liu returned to the era of the Great Kung Lao, Kung Lao's ancestor.
And, Raiden also joined Kang Liu in this quest, too.

posts.title: Facebook ban situation
posts.body:
Mark Zuckerberg used to betray his friend. What did this say about him?
It says, that Mark is a treacherous son of a bitch. And then, he married a Chinese bitch(Who is basically a Communist ass kisser), and listened to her.
I mean, betraying his best friend already showed you who he is, but marrying a Communist wife, a.k.a Feminist, then it revealed to you, that Mark is really not on the side of Freedom.
That is why, he and his shitty company banned people who express their freedom of speech, such as myself

posts.title: Responsive Screen
posts.body:
Drag the screen in Responsive Mode to see how it changes.
Notice, on the top right side of the screen, there is a symbol. When the symbols change, you will know which mode you are in.
Right now, I am using Desktop mode, therefore, the symbol is the image of a Desktop.
Shrink it, make it smaller, and you will see the differences.

posts.title: Jobs in Vietnam
posts.body:
The situations are getting worse everyday.
The Vietnamese Communists are unable to help the people(Which is THEIR JOB, by the way) to find the jobs.
Countries such as South Korea, Taiwan, Japan, and especially USA, no longer want to share their prosperity with the Vietnamese Communists.
The reason is very simple. The Communists DO NOT HAVE the same values with those countries.
On one hand, the Communists want to keep their power. On the other hand, they still want to keep the Party, to keep their seats, and give no flying fuck about the Nation.
The answer to this question is so simple. The Communists HAVE TO GO.
Rest assured, the revolt in Dak Lak is just the beginning.
Gentlemen, we are witnessing REAL LIFE HISTORY right now.
This is why, I always recommend you guys to read HISTORY.
It is for a good reason.
